files.patch:
@@ -850,0 +850,5 @@
+    // FIXME: We should consider supporting access/modification to local storage
+    // after calling window.close(). See <https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=135330>.
+    if (m_localStorage)
+        return m_localStorage.get();
+
@@ -858,5 +863,0 @@
-    // FIXME: We should consider supporting access/modification to local storage
-    // after calling window.close(). See <https://bugs.webkit.org/show_bug.cgi?id=135330>.
-    if (m_localStorage)
-            return m_localStorage.get();
-
